item.title: Executive Fortnightly Catch-Up – Wed 29 Oct
item.description: Executive team meeting on Wednesday.

item.title: AusLeave Conference – Thu 30 Oct
item.description: Chairs & CEOs of all state-based schemes meet to discuss national matters.

item.title: Halloween Trivia Night – Thu 30 Oct 17:00
item.description: Arrive 4:30pm for 5pm start, Level 5 Breakout. Teams 2–8. Food & drinks provided. Prizes for winners & best dressed.

item.title: New Starters – Shane Fernando; Sachin Sharma
item.description: Welcome Shane (Delivery Lead, Elevate, started 22 Oct) and Sachin (Salesforce Specialist, starts 29 Oct).

item.title: Farewell – Aneta Nikoloski (Thu 30 Oct)
item.description: Aneta’s last day is Thursday. Thanks to Aneta for her contribution and best wishes for the future.

item.title: Christmas Party – RSVP
item.description: RSVP for the Christmas Party if you haven’t already.

item.title: Acknowledgement of Country – Presenters EOI
item.description: Interested in presenting the Acknowledgement of Country at Town Hall? Add your name.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Artemis Rohanian
item.description: Recognised for exceptional collaboration and positive change. A true change champion who builds connections and drives progress.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Lisa Bihari
item.description: Created 15 Coverage Hub profiles with high quality and speed, adopting governance and sharing knowledge to help smash PI5 goals.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Andrew Mackenzie
item.description: Supported Elevate squads, briefed CFMEU delegates, connected industry stakeholders for testing, and kept member experience front of mind.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Keely Lock
item.description: Wrote and rolled out a Returns training plan; engaging and easy to follow, with docs provided and hands-on support during practice.

item.title: LOVE Award People’s Choice – Helen Hawkins
item.description: Celebrated for making onboarding and training seamless, fun and interactive, helping new starters consolidate knowledge.

item.title: LOVE Awards – Nominate a Colleague
item.description: Seen someone living our values? Nominate them for a LeavePlus LOVE award.

item.title: Got Feedback? Tell Us
item.description: Share your feedback or ideas. Your voice helps improve how we work together.

item.title: Wellness Corner – Weekly Tips
item.description: Maintain healthy relationships: communicate needs, resolve conflicts respectfully, avoid abusive behaviour.

item.title: Internal Vacancies – G2 to G5 roles
item.description: Open roles include Member Response (G3), Service Investigations (G2), Member Benefits (G2), Business Readiness Test Lead (G4), more.

item.title: JEF Update – Grades & Sublevels Confirmed
item.description: All roles graded; sublevels B=25% and C=50% of range. P&C to brief teams.

item.title: Capability Framework – Launching Before Year-End
item.description: Leader toolkits, personas and materials to support growth & progression.

item.title: Org Chart – Where to Find & Update Details
item.description: People Hub & ELMO have org charts. Update your address, pay, and contacts in ELMO.

item.title: Elevate Showcase – Wed 5 Nov
item.description: Learn about Coverage Assessment Tool, IDV by consultant, Kermit default, Coverage Hub.

item.title: Coverage Hub – Your Source of Truth
item.description: 50 occupation profiles, search/browse A–Z, templates & links to authoritative resources.

item.title: Knowledge Hub – Foundations & Next Steps
item.description: Single source of truth with taxonomy, governance and a test–learn–enhance roadmap.

item.title: New Starters – Legal & Compliance
item.description: Lilly Zaffina, Cath Hinton, Christina Walls; Senan O’Muiri returns as Consultant.

item.title: New Starters – Elevate
item.description: Shane Fernando joins as Delivery Lead (contractor).

item.title: New Starters – Technology & Innovation
item.description: Andrew Maybury, Nathan Vu and Sach Sharma join the engineering team.

item.title: New Starter – Product & Experience
item.description: Naomi Faye joins as UX Copywriter.

item.title: Internal Movements – Secondments
item.description: Steph Gilbert to Approver – Operations Support; Luchienne Ebrahim to Product Owner.

item.title: Promotion – Andrew Mackenzie
item.description: Promoted to Senior Manager – Industry Engagement. Congrats, Andrew!

item.title: Farewells – Dennis Clark & James Boyd
item.description: Wishing Dennis (Risk Specialist) and James (Full Stack Developer) all the best.
